title: In the World of Crawling Dead The Record of War of a Certain High School - Novel Updates
tags: Apocalypse   Death of Loved Ones   Depictions of Cruelty   Friendship   Gore   Male Protagonist   Multiple POV   R-15   Survival   Zombies
author: Miki Seiya   三木　靖也
description:
The collapse of the world started.

People ran around trying to escape, cars caused accidents.

During this time, “zombies” walked around, weaving their way through.

Hordes of dead ate people and continued advancing.

What do the students, who met up at the school they always go to and continued fighting, think, and what do they feel about dying?

A fight to survive begins.>
